description: Try our easy to follow Curried Mixed Sprouts & Quinoa Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Vegetable soup,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Halal,High protein,High fibre,One-pot,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Tomato,Low fat,Peanut free
name: Curried Mixed Sprouts & Quinoa Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 red chilli, seeds removed, finely chopped
1 cup coriander leaves, plus extra to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large heavy-based saucepan over medium heat. Cook fennel and mustard seeds for 1 minute or until they start to pop. Add onion, garlic, ginger, chilli, turmeric and curry powder. Cook for 5 minutes or until onion is tender. Add sprouts and quinoa, and stir for 1 minute to coat with spice.
Stir in tomato, capsicum, stock and 2 cups water. Bring to the boil, reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 12 minutes or until sprouts are tender. Stir in coriander and season to taste.
To serve soup, scatter over extra coriander and top with yoghurt.
